top_stories.title: Are bad incentives to blame for AI hallucinations?
top_stories.description: A new research paper from OpenAI asks why large language models like GPT-5 and chatbots like ChatGPT still hallucinate and whether anything can be done to reduce those hallucinations.
top_stories.author: Anthony Ha
top_stories.content: A new research paper from OpenAI asks why large language models like GPT-5 and chatbots like ChatGPT still hallucinate and whether anything can be done to reduce those hallucinations.

top_stories.title: Databricks Surpasses $4B Revenue Run-Rate, $1B from AI Revenue
top_stories.description: Company is closing $1B Series K at >$100B valuation Databricks, the Data and AI company, today announced it has crossed a $4 billion revenue run-rate during Q2, growing >50% year over year. Databricks’ AI products also recently crossed a $1 billion revenue run-rate. The company has also achieved positive free cash flow over the last 12 months.... The post Databricks Surpasses $4B Revenue Run-Rate, $1B from AI Revenue first appeared on AI-Tech Park.
top_stories.author: PR Newswire
top_stories.content: Company is closing $1B Series K at >$100B valuation Databricks, the Data and AI company, today announced it has crossed a $4 billion revenue run-rate during Q2, growing >50% year over year. Databricks’ AI products also recently crossed a $1 billion revenue run-rate. The company has also achieved positive free cash flow over the last 12 months.... The post Databricks Surpasses $4B Revenue Run-Rate, $1B from AI Revenue first appeared on AI-Tech Park.

top_stories.title: Karnataka Hosts Half of India’s Mid-Market GCCs, Says Study
top_stories.description: These centres employ nearly 74,000 professionals in Karnataka. The post Karnataka Hosts Half of India’s Mid-Market GCCs, Says Study appeared first on Analytics India Magazine.
top_stories.author: Shalini Mondal
top_stories.content: These centres employ nearly 74,000 professionals in Karnataka. The post Karnataka Hosts Half of India’s Mid-Market GCCs, Says Study appeared first on Analytics India Magazine.

top_stories.title: Accelerating HPC and AI research in universities with Amazon SageMaker HyperPod
top_stories.description: In this post, we demonstrate how a research university implemented SageMaker HyperPod to accelerate AI research by using dynamic SLURM partitions, fine-grained GPU resource management, budget-aware compute cost tracking, and multi-login node load balancing—all integrated seamlessly into the SageMaker HyperPod environment.
top_stories.author: Tasneem Fathima
top_stories.content: In this post, we demonstrate how a research university implemented SageMaker HyperPod to accelerate AI research by using dynamic SLURM partitions, fine-grained GPU resource management, budget-aware compute cost tracking, and multi-login node load balancing—all integrated seamlessly into the SageMaker HyperPod environment.

top_stories.title: RavenDB Debuts Fully Integrated, Database-Native AI Agent Builder
top_stories.description: Unlike the limited embedded solutions on the market, this first-of-its-kind feature lets developers build fully native AI agents to turn existing data into personalized experiences. RavenDB, a multi-model NoSQL document database trusted by developers and enterprises worldwide, today announced the launch of its AI Agent Creator, a first-to-market feature fully... The post RavenDB Debuts Fully Integrated, Database-Native AI Agent Builder first appeared on AI-Tech Park.
